# MrCall.ai

> MrCall is an AI-powered agentic infrastructure that answers phone calls, triages email, and manages CRM operations for businesses. It serves as a complete virtual office agent.

## About

MrCall provides AI phone agents for small and medium businesses. The system answers incoming calls with natural, high-fidelity voice conversations, extracts key information, books appointments, sends follow-up messages via WhatsApp/SMS, and integrates with CRM and calendar systems.

Founded and headquartered in Milan, Italy. Available globally with multilingual support.

## Key Capabilities

- AI voice reception with natural conversation
- Automated transcription and information extraction
- Calendar integration (Google Calendar, Outlook)
- WhatsApp and SMS notifications
- CRM synchronization (bidirectional, coming soon)
- Native iOS and Android mobile apps
- Multi-tenant enterprise support
- Knowledge base creation for custom FAQ handling
- Multilingual support

## Use Cases

MrCall serves: freelancers, medical practices, real estate agencies, restaurants, car dealerships, and property managers. Any business that receives phone calls and needs professional, 24/7 call handling.

## Pricing

Three plans starting at EUR 25/month (Essential), EUR 50/month (Starter), EUR 150/month (Professional). Free trial available. All prices exclude VAT.

## API

MrCall offers webhook integrations and CRM sync capabilities. Contact support@mrcall.ai for API access and documentation.
